review: The Fire TV Stick that I received from you did not work, the setup did  but we could not see anything but a blue screen and a message telling us that our TV had a HDCP Error meaning that my TV was not HDMI compliant. Long story short is my second call to Amazon Customer Service resulted in talking to an American tech named Zak versus a Philippine tech, who took the time to listen to me.My son found an article describing the problem and the fix, it turns out that this is a common problem and the fix is a HDMI Splitter. Zak found one for me on your site but it wasn't sold or shipped by Amazon resulting in it's taking 10 days to reach me. I finally got it, installed it, and viola, the Fire TV Stick works slicker than snot which is what I told him when he called to see how things were.We especially like the remote, it is so much smoother and faster to scan your offerings than our TV remote. I guess my biggest gripe is I had to fork out another $30 bucks and another 10 days to be able to use my Fire TV StickAfter all is said & done I would definitely recommend it, like I said, Slicker than snot.
